com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.mappers

Class OdpSearchCriteriaMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.mappers.OdpSearchCriteriaMapper

  • public class OdpSearchCriteriaMapper
extends Object
    Mapper class for converting between presentation layer form data and service layer search criteria.

    This mapper bridges the gap between the RDS framework's ERPParam-based form entities (OdpSearchFormEntitiesData) and the clean, framework-independent search criteria (OdpSearchCriteria) used by the service layer.

    Design Pattern: Static utility class following the Mapper pattern. Provides unidirectional conversion from form data to search criteria.

    Null Handling: The mapper safely handles null form fields and null values within fields. Only non-null, non-empty values are mapped to the search criteria.

    Field Mappings:

    Form Field (OdpSearchFormEntitiesData) Type Criteria Field (OdpSearchCriteria) Type
    ricercaLibera GenericText ricercaLibera String
    stato List (ERPParam) statiSelezionati List<String>
    odp List (ERPParam) odpSelezionati List<String>
    azienda List (ERPParam) aziendeSelezionate List<String>
    importoDa GenericNumber importoDa BigDecimal
    importoA GenericNumber importoA BigDecimal
    dataCreazioneDa DateParam dataCreazioneDa LocalDate
    dataCreazioneA DateParam dataCreazioneA LocalDate
    tipoOrdine List (ERPParam) tipiOrdineSelezionati List<String>
    arriveraFattura List (ERPParam) arriveraFatturaSelezionati List<String>
    storico List (ERPParam) storicoSelezionati List<String>

    Example Usage:

     // In OdpSearchResultsDataGrid.getROWS()
 OdpSearchFormEntitiesData formData = odpSearchForm.getSimpleEntitiesData();
 OdpSearchCriteria criteria = OdpSearchCriteriaMapper.fromFormData(formData);
 List<Odp> results = odpService.searchOdps(criteria);
    Author:
    Claude Code
    See Also:
    OdpSearchFormEntitiesData, OdpSearchCriteria

    • Method Detail

      • fromFormData

        public static OdpSearchCriteria fromFormData(OdpSearchFormEntitiesData formData)
        Converts form entities data to search criteria for the service layer.

        This method performs a safe conversion, checking for null values at both the field level and within the field values. Only non-null, non-empty values are mapped to the resulting search criteria.

        Empty Field Handling:

        • Null or empty text fields â†’ null in criteria
        • Null or zero numeric fields â†’ null in criteria
        • Null or invalid date fields â†’ null in criteria
        • Empty or no-selection lists â†’ null in criteria
        Parameters:
        formData - the form entities data from the search form, must not be null
        Returns:
        the search criteria ready for service layer consumption, never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if formData is null
